resources.string: Welcome to the Musical Structure App. You can easily find the song you are looking for :). All the songs are played in the Media Player.
Here is a list of all the albums in alphabetical order. You can add another album by clicking the button below. Once you click on a given song, it will be played in the Media Player.
Here is a list of all the artists in alphabetical order. You can add another artist by clicking the button below. Once you click on a given song, it will be played in the Media Player.
Here is a list of all the albums in alphabetical order. You can add another genre by clicking the button below. Once you click on a given song, it will be played in the Media Player.
Here is a list of all the playlists in alphabetical order. You can add another playlist by clicking the button below. Once you click on a given song, it will be played in the Media Player.
Here is a list of all the songs in alphabetical order. You can add another song by clicking the button below. Once you click on a given song, it will be played in the Media Player.
